bibl.note: This is a letter from William P. Bryon to Governor James K. Polk, dated June 2, 1840. Bryon is notifying Polk of the requisition for arms submitted by Captain William Carroll.

div.p: Captain William H Carroll of the Nashville Blues has This day reported his company consisting of forty four men fully organized and equipped and herewith makes application for arms and accoutrements for said company
